description: Rear extension to the existing first floor flat to form a 2 bedroom flat, including associated remedial works to the upper parts and to the restaurant demise, installation of new rear full height extract duct and provision of a services void with ventilation louvres between ground and first floor at the rear for the existing ground floor restaurant.
